Name: Shoot The Zombirds VR
About the game: A quiet evening on the cemetery finds you playing with your Pumpkin kids. SUDDENLY, a horde of Zombirds clouds the sky! Those unprofessionally dead birds invaded your piece of Virtual Reality and will stop at nothing to kidnap your children. NEVER GOING TO HAPPEN! Play your role in the theatrical staging of these thrilling events! Grab your ol' trusty crossbow and Shoot The Zombirds in this super immersive, endless gallery shooter. Destroy countless waves of dead birds, varied in shapes and sizes. Build your combos to increase the score or enter the Fury Mode! Collect and use power-ups to obliterate even the fiercest of the fowl. FEATURES: Endless waves of Zombirds to slay! Diverse power-ups to aid you against the rotting fowl. Multiple difficulties appropriate for all skill levels. Local and on-line leaderboards.
